name: Confirm correct construction drawings approved for use.
Incoming Inspection - PASS if received in good condition - If not FAIL & Attach Photos/Comments below
Confirm support at change of direction at 1m max.
Confirm support of pipework no more than 1m from end.
Confirm first support of range pipe within 2m of mains.
Confirm pipework installed as per drawing.
Confirm pipework installed fall back to drain
Confirm isolation and drain valves are closed.
Fill pipework with air to 50kpa to confirm no open ends.
Fill pipework with water to 1600kpa. Hold 2 hours. No pressure loss permitted.
Fill pipework with air to 300kpa. Hold for 30 minutes. Pressure loss of 10% (30kpa) permitted.
Record pressure test results on Pressure Test Form.
Select relevant Test Criteria
values: PRE-ACTION FIRE SPRINKLERS - HYDROSTATIC TEST – 1600kpa 2 HOURS - NO LOSS, PRE-ACTION FIRE SPRINKLERS - PNEUMATIC TEST – 300kpa 30 MINS - PERMITTED LOSS 10% (30kpa)

name: Test completed to specification/drawings & Area left clean/tidy
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
